name: Submerged Echoes
description:
Submerged Echoes is a minimalist, short, narrative experience inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's literature (in particular, the Cthulhu mythos) and Thrust-like gameplay.

In the game you'll interpret a bathyscaphe pilot who is tasked with finding the Queen Mary, an allied submarine who mysteriously disappeared.

Even though it is a narrative experience, it has been designed to be moderately challenging, as such, every time the bathyscaphe touches a wall or an obstacle you'll have to restart the level.

On the other hand note that the game is very short, a perfect playthrough (that is, without deaths) will last under 5 mins.

If you find some bugs, problems or simply want to contact me, please do it at the following e-mail address: onyris93@gmail.com
